channel.title: Looking for client programmers
channel.description:
Hello. I am looking for experiend client programmers, please reply if you think you can work for me.
What needs to be done: Fixing the RAM usage of the client
leave your skype username below and I will contact you.
skype: rafr200

item.title: Looking for client programmers
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

remove all of your 9999 models
done
if your ram usage is high itâ€™s probably to do with custom content [seeing as nobody actually modifies the code, just resources], which you cant really fix without deleting some of it/reducing resolution etc
[or changing the way most of the client works]

Also payment is not allowed.
